meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.5 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.5 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 released!
meta.summary: Vert.x 4 has just been released and itâ€™s the best thing since sliced buffers.

meta.title: Checklist for Migrating from Vert.x 2.1.x to Vert.x 3 - Part One
meta.summary: So while upgrading our application, I thought I should note down all the changes that we had to do in the process. Since Vert.x 3 is a major upgrade from the previous version, with so many changes.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.9 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.9 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.
